SymbolDef.name: SimDisplay
SymbolDef.descr: Sim display property, type, and set definitions.

PropertyDef.name: DisplayID
PropertyDef.descr: An integer index that identifies a display. Views in a ViewGroup are assigned to displays using this value.

PropertyDef.name: AdapterIndex
PropertyDef.descr: Adapter index of a display output. Adapter index values are assigned in the order outputs are listed by the operating system and often match the display numbers shown in the Windows screen resolution menu. This value may change if displays are disconnected and reconnected.

PropertyDef.name: MachineID
PropertyDef.descr: The index of the computer/machine the display is connected to. This values is used to specific displays on Multichannel clients when a simulation session is being distributed across multiple machines. (Default is 1 which should be reserved for the multichannel host)

PropertyDef.name: Name
PropertyDef.descr: The name of this element (Display, Plugin, or Parameter).

PropertyDef.name: Value
PropertyDef.descr: The value to pass in to a Plugin parameter. This is a TEXT element but it may be interpreted as a numeric value by some Plugins.

SetDef.name: Parameter
SetDef.descr: A parameter name/value pair which can be used to configure a plugin.

SetDef.name: Plugin
SetDef.descr: A plugin such as a post-process which will be applied to all views on this device.

SetDef.name: Display
SetDef.descr: Contains the settings for specific display (such as a monitor or projector).
